query.name: select_usuario
query.value: SELECT id, codigo, nombre, apellido, COALESCE(email, '') AS "email" FROM usuario

query.name: filter_usuario
query.value: id || codigo || nombre || apellido || COALESCE(email, '')

query.name: select_roles_usuario
query.value: SELECT rol.id AS rolid, codigo AS codrol, descripcion AS descriprol, ru.id IS NOT NULL AS selected FROM rol LEFT JOIN rolusuario ru ON rol.id = ru.rol_id AND ru.usuario_id = ?

query.name: select_barrios
query.value: SELECT b.id AS id, b.codigo AS codigo, b.nombre AS nombre, b.latitud AS latitud, b.longitud AS longitud, c.nombre AS ciudad FROM barrio b JOIN ciudad c ON b.ciudad_id = c.id

query.name: filter_barrios
query.value: codigo||nombre

query.name: select_ciudades
query.value: SELECT c.id AS id, c.codigo AS codigo, c.nombre AS nombre, c.longitud AS longitud, c.latitud AS latitud FROM ciudad c

query.name: filter_ciudades
query.value: c.codigo||c.nombre

query.name: get_ultimo_reset
query.value: SELECT max(fecha) AS ultimo, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS hoy FROM resetpass WHERE codigo = ?

query.name: select_historial_conexiones
query.value: SELECT to_char(fechalogin,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI') fecha, ip FROM info_conexion WHERE usuario = ? limit 10

query.name: select_clientes
query.value: SELECT c.id AS id, c.cedula AS cedula, c.ruc AS ruc, u.nombre AS nombre, u.apellido AS apellido FROM cliente c JOIN usuario u ON c.usuario_id = u.id

query.name: filter_clientes
query.value: c.cedula||u.nombre||u.apellido

query.name: select_seguros
query.value: SELECT id, poliza, aseguradora, descripcion, vencimiento FROM seguro

query.name: filter_seguros
query.value: aseguradora||descripcion||vencimiento

query.name: select_usuarios_picker
query.value: SELECT id, codigo, nombre, apellido, email, (CASE (SELECT usuario_id FROM seguronotificarusuario WHERE seguro_id = ? AND usuario_id = usuario.id) WHEN id THEN true ELSE false END) AS selected FROM usuario where id NOT IN (SELECT usuario_id FROM cliente)

query.name: filter_usuarios_picker
query.value: codigo||nombre||apellido

query.name: select_camiones
query.value: SELECT c.id AS id, c.chapa AS chapa, c.marca AS marca, c.modelo AS modelo, c.anio AS anio, s.aseguradora AS aseguradora FROM camion c LEFT JOIN seguro s ON c.id = s.camion_id

query.name: filter_camiones
query.value: chapa||marca||modelo

query.name: select_domain_roles_usuario
query.value: SELECT r.id AS id, r.codigo AS codigo, r.descripcion AS descripcion FROM rol r JOIN rolusuario u ON r.id = u.rol_id WHERE u.usuario_id = ?

query.name: filter_domain_roles_usuario
query.value: codigo

query.name: select_choferes
query.value: SELECT c.id AS id, c.cedula AS cedula, c.categoria AS categoria, u.nombre AS nombre, u.apellido AS apellido FROM chofer c JOIN usuario u ON c.usuario_id = u.id

query.name: filter_choferes
query.value: c.cedula||u.nombre||u.apellido

query.name: select_insumos
query.value: SELECT id, nombre, descripcion, cantidad, costo FROM insumo

query.name: filter_insumos
query.value: nombre||cantidad||costo

query.name: select_pedidos
query.value: SELECT p.id AS id, c.cedula AS cliente, p.direccion AS direccion , b.nombre AS barrio, ci.nombre AS ciudad, ca.marca||' '||ca.modelo AS camion, p.costo AS costo, p.fechapedido AS fechapedido, p.fechaentrega AS fechaentrega FROM pedido p JOIN cliente c ON p.cliente_id = c.id FULL OUTER JOIN barrio b ON p.barrio_id = b.id JOIN ciudad ci ON p.ciudad_id = ci.id JOIN camion ca ON p.camion_id = ca.id

query.name: filter_pedidos
query.value: cliente||fechapedido||costo||ciudad

query.name: select_camiones_con_chofer
query.value: SELECT c.id AS id, c.chapa AS chapa, c.marca AS marca, c.modelo AS modelo, c.anio AS anio, s.aseguradora AS aseguradora FROM camion c LEFT JOIN seguro s ON c.id = s.camion_id JOIN chofer ch ON ch.camion_id = c.id
